Uses of Class
com.abmash.api.query.Query

  • Packages that use Query 
    Package Description
    com.abmash.api
    Provides the main classes to control browsers and to find and interact with elements on the current web page.
    com.abmash.api.browser
    Provides classes to extend the Browser functionality and to further interact with it.
    com.abmash.api.query
    Provides classes to find elements on web pages.
    com.abmash.core.browser.waitcondition
    Provides classes to wait for certain events or conditions in order to properly react to changes (AJAX, Websockets, etc.).

    • Uses of Query in com.abmash.api

      Methods in com.abmash.api that return Query 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Query HtmlElement.above()
      Creates an HtmlQuery to find elements above this one.
      Query HtmlElement.below()
      Creates an HtmlQuery to find elements below this one.
      Query HtmlElement.leftTo()
      Creates an HtmlQuery to find elements left to this one.
      Query Browser.query(Predicate... predicates) 
      Query HtmlElement.rightTo()
      Creates an HtmlQuery to find elements right to this one.

    • Uses of Query in com.abmash.api.browser

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WaitFor.query(Query query)
      Waits until element is found.

    • Uses of Query in com.abmash.api.query

      Methods in com.abmash.api.query that return Query 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Query QueryFactory.query(Browser browser, Predicate... predicates)
      Creates a new query to find elements in the specified browser and with the given predicates, used by calling Browser.query(Predicate...).
      static Query QueryFactory.union(Query... queries)
      Creates a union of multiple queries by merging their results.
      Methods in com.abmash.api.query with parameters of type Query 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Query.union(Query... queries) 
      static Query QueryFactory.union(Query... queries)
      Creates a union of multiple queries by merging their results.
